name: Adventures In In In In
description:
Created for the Rpg Paper Maker Jam 2.

A game where you play as a mouse and encounter some strange things.

This game is very short. It takes about 9-10 minutes to complete.

CONTROLS:

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

Z to interact

X to cancel

Q and E to move the camera

Created using RPG Paper maker by Wano. Check out the engine here:

http://rpg-paper-maker.com/?i=1
